definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] (a type of zither)/musical instrument in general
variant of 琴[qin2], guqin or zither

sentences.english: Did you hear about the violist who bragged that he could play 32nd notes?
sentences.chinese: 你听说有个中提琴手号称能拉32分音符吗？

sentences.english: What do you do with a dead violist?
sentences.chinese: 有个中提琴手死了咋办？

sentences.english: Why don't violists play hide and seek?
sentences.chinese: 为什么中提琴手不玩躲猫猫？

sentences.english: The violins and violas train their bows as they let out dissonant chords.
sentences.chinese: 小提琴和中提琴振动音弦仿佛发出了不和谐的音乐。

sentences.english: Why shouldn't violists take up mountaineering?
sentences.chinese: 为什么中提琴手不该去登山呢？

sentences.english: How many violists does it take to screw in a light bulb?
sentences.chinese: 拧一个灯泡需要几个中提琴手？

sentences.english: How do you get a viola section to play spiccato?
sentences.chinese: 怎样让中提琴声部演奏跳弓呢？

sentences.english: All these people happen to be playing the violin, viola,or what have you next to you.
sentences.chinese: 这些人不只是碰巧在你身边，演奏小提琴或中提琴。

sentences.english: Why do people tremble with fear when someone comes into a bank carrying a viola case?
sentences.chinese: 为什么人们非常担心看到有人带着中提琴的盒子？

sentences.english: Why is viola called BRATSCHE in Germany?
sentences.chinese: 为什么德语里中提琴叫“不拉车”？

sentences.english: Why is a viola solo like premature ejaculation?
sentences.chinese: 为什么中提琴独奏和早泄一样？

sentences.english: Why do violists have pea-sized brains?
sentences.chinese: 中提琴手为什么脑子和豌豆一样大？

sentences.english: She plays the violin, I mean the viola, really well.
sentences.chinese: 她的小提琴，我是指中提琴，的确拉得很好。

sentences.english: Did you hear about the violist who played in tune?
sentences.chinese: 你听说过不跑调的中提琴手么？

sentences.english: How do you keep a violist from drowning?
sentences.chinese: 怎样防止中提琴手溺水？

sentences.english: How many violists does it take to make a batch of chocolate chip cookies?
sentences.chinese: 中提琴手为什么脑子和豌豆一样大？酒喝多了撑的。

definition: double reed wind instrument (such as oboe or bassoon)
instrument of the violin family (violin, viola, cello or double bass)/CL:把[ba3]
musical ensemble of several instruments (e.g. duet 二重奏 or trio 三重奏)
